title: Single-molecule electrical studies on a 7 nm long molecular wire.
abstract: A self-assembled arylene-ethynylene molecular wire with a rigid 7 nm long backbone exhibits symmetrical current-voltage (I-V) characteristics and a single-molecule current of 0.35 + 0.05 nA at 0.3 V; these data are supported by theoretical calculations
